citation: Proclamation under the Co-operative Schemes (Administrative Actions) Act 2001 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Co-operative Schemes (Administrative Actions) Act 2001

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 4(2) of the Co-operative Schemes (Administrative Actions) Act 2001 declare that the Classification (Publications, Films and Computer Games) Enforcement Act 1995 and the Australian Crime Commission (Tasmania) Act 2004 are relevant State Acts for the purposes of the Co-operative Schemes (Administrative Actions) Act 2001 .

6 May 2002

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. PATMORE

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 15 May 2002

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
